subtasks.description:
## CRITICAL: Fix Typecheck Errors First

The codebase has typecheck errors that MUST be fixed before any other work can proceed.

Run `bun run typecheck` to see the errors, then fix them.

Common causes:
- Unused imports or variables (TS6133)
- Type mismatches (TS2322)
- Missing or extra arguments (TS2554)

After fixing, verify with `bun run typecheck` that it passes before proceeding.

Wire e2eCommands into orchestrator verification

ProjectConfig includes e2eCommands but orchestrator never runs them; Golden Loop acceptance requires tests+e2e. Add e2e execution when configured (and by label if needed) with proper reporting and failure handling.
subtasks.lastFailureReason: Error: invalidArgument: "invalid volume name '.': must match ^[A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9_.-]*$"
